column1: {% load humanize %}{% autoescape off %}{% load ietf_filters %}"Date"
{% for item in schedule.assignments.all.distinct %}{% if item.timeslot.type.slug == "break" %}"{{ item.timeslot.time|date:"Y-m-d" }}"

column12: {% if item.session.slides %}{% for slide in item.session.slides %}http://www.ietf.org/proceedings/{{ schedule.meeting.number }}/slides/{{ slide.external_url }}{% if not forloop.last %}|{% endif %}{% endfor %}{% endif %}

column1: {% endif %}{% if item.timeslot.type.slug == "session" and item.session.group %}"{{ item.timeslot.time|date:"Y-m-d" }}"
column12: {% if item.session.slides %}{% for slide in item.session.slides %}http://www.ietf.org/proceedings/{{ schedule.meeting.number }}/slides/{{ slide.external_url }}{% if not forloop.last %}|{% endif %}{% endfor %}{% endif %}
